price: 77. (Kani waa) jidkayaga xagga Rususha aan soo dirnay hortaa, kamana heleysid wax isbeddel ah jidkayaga.
arabic: سُنَّةَ مَن قَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا قَبۡلَكَ مِن رُّسُلِنَاۖ وَلَا تَجِدُ لِسُنَّتِنَا تَحۡوِيلًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: sunnata man qad arsalnā qablaka min rusulinā walā tajidu lisunnatinā taḥwīlan
